a = list(map(int, input().split())) # input only integers
if sum(a) >= 22:
    print('bust')
else:
    print('win')


a, b, c, d, e, f = map(int, input().split())
if sum(a, b, c, d, e, f) >= 22:
    print('bust')
else:
    print('win')


# My answer 
a1, a2, a3 = map(int, input().split())
if a1 + a2 + a3 >= 22:
    print('bust')
else:
    print('win')
